Title: Relates to prohibiting the taking of zoo, petting zoo, carnival or circus animals
Summary: Prohibits the taking of zoo, petting zoo, carnival or circus animals; provides that violations shall be punishable by a fine of not less than five hundred dollars nor more than two thousand dollars.
LawCode: Add ยง11-1908, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the taking of zoo, petting zoo, carnival or circus animals
